html:
9.3.21  2:42 am    what is music?

      i have no idea

9.3.21  1:08 am   what are your songs made of?

      time

9.3.21  12:28 am   have you done a Christmas song yet?

      yes but i would like to do more

9.3.21  12:10 am   what is the most important thing to consider when planning to exist

      that it's already happening

9.2.21  10:34 pm   Did you ever figure out why the coast guard was guarding the coast?

      someone's gotta do it

9.2.21  10:11 pm   why do i see so much beauty in everything?

     because it's actually there

     it makes me really depressed - knowing that i'll never get to experience it all.

      i think you will

9.2.21  10:01 pm   What inspires you when you make your drum grooves?

     the song

      They're so unique and funky and the percussion incredible

9.2.21  9:28 pm   Is it hard to write songs when you first start out? Or is it always hard.

      the hardest part is remembering how easy it is

9.2.21  5:46 pm   How can I become good at playing with both hands on piano.  Because right now I can't.

      hm... it sounds like you need some real world tasks. like convincing a person that everything is ok, using only the piano and your voice. try to imagine what you would do if you had to be put in that situation

9.2.21  5:18 pm   What is the point of living

      to see what's possible

9.2.21  5:02 pm   you had a really fun answer for enlightenment some time ago, and sadly i can't it :( so, if you still had something to say about enlightenment, what would it be? :)

      it's higher than before. they keep raising it

9.2.21  4:20 pm   is it good to return to a song i'm not satisfied with to rewrite it, or shoud i go on making another song?

      those are both good. you can do both, if you think you have time

9.2.21  1:15 pm   hey bill, do you like geography?

      yes

9.2.21  11:35 am   what note is a microwave beep?

      near Bb. which i assume is a multiple of 60hz, because it seems to match the hum the microwave makes when cooking

9.2.21  11:25 am   Is magnetic energy unethical?

      no

9.2.21  11:01 am   What is there left to be discovered?

      i don't know yet

9.2.21  9:24 am   What future events are you looking forward to the most?

      the 2-day thing

9.2.21  7:17 am   why was i born?

      it's just what you needed at the time

9.2.21  6:19 am   What should i ask?

      what to ask

9.2.21  4:30 am   how do i stop judging myself and let myself be 

      if you judge yourself for judging yourself, that's a double-judge, which cancels out

9.2.21  3:35 am   what is music?

      like a reflection of you, but not a reflection. actual

9.2.21  12:47 am   is there a physical location that you find yourself most creative in?

      yes, which is often different from the previous one

9.2.21  12:05 am   how can i be proud of my own voice 

      make a list of the things you can do with it

9.1.21  11:07 pm   help,, how do i speak dog language? 

      just tell the truth

9.1.21  10:51 pm   Is the word "road" in your next song

      no

9.1.21  9:35 pm   are you real?

      oh that would be almost too convenient

9.1.21  9:01 pm   how many days does it take to make a vid

      how about 4

9.1.21  8:59 pm   in 'and the day goes on' it says that 1+1+1+1=1. do you have a mathematical proof for this?

      no

9.1.21  8:47 pm   Why do you answer questions?

      in case i might know the answer

9.1.21  8:07 pm   what is your favorite natural disaster?

      the morning

9.1.21  6:10 pm   how to grow the brain three sizes

      water it?

9.1.21  4:50 pm   how to be cool?

      impossible. it can't be done

9.1.21  4:22 pm   why is time such a funny thing 

      because now is now, and now is now, but they're different

9.1.21  3:51 pm   is there a simple way to achieve normal human functions, for example being able to function in a normal human fashion?

      try being born as a human. easier said than done, i know

9.1.21  3:02 pm   who created god? 

      it's on auto-create

9.1.21  12:49 pm   do you need some cabbage in your diet

      i don't know

9.1.21  11:34 am   opinion on september?

      temperate

9.1.21  10:14 am   If you could travel to any other planet which one would it be

      venus

9.1.21  9:20 am   how to be dumb?

      the first thing you wanna do is go ahead and get insanely smart

9.1.21  7:04 am   would you kindly share with us 13 different words in the next song

     the
     be
     to
     and
     a
     in
     that
     i
     it
     for
     on
     you
     do

9.1.21  6:19 am   whats your favourite year

      1

9.1.21  4:42 am   is god real

      are you

9.1.21  3:43 am   why do birds fly

      to get from point A to B

9.1.21  3:39 am   when will you lift up the whole entire world

      pretty soon maybe

9.1.21  2:56 am   How do I get the motivation to create art?

      do you want to

9.1.21  12:55 am   Do you measure feet by the measurement or an actual foot?

     a foot is usually measured in inches or centimeters

     If an actual foot, what size.

      12 inches

9.1.21  12:50 am   Have you heard of Joe?

      oh i'm not falling for that one again

9.1.21  12:11 am   is water sharp or smooth??

      oh i'm not falling for that one again





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.21  11:35 pm   If you were to go to subway, what's your subway order? 

      i would try to order the sign. or maybe just the part that says 'bw'

8.31.21  9:40 pm   Was it difficult for you to learn how to animate in 3D for your latest songs?

      the hardest part was realizing if i actually learned everything about it that i think i need, i would never get a chance to make any songs
